languages.text: {n}Подростки не отрывают от вас взгляда. Девочка, жмущаяся поближе к Ардженте, неуверенно улыбается, худющий бледный парнишка пытается приосаниться и встать как военный, по стойке смирно. Лишь несколько подростков с дальнего края шеренги кажутся хмурыми и не слишком впечатленными.{/n}

{n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Подростки не отрывают от вас взгляда. Девочка, жмущаяся поближе к Ардженте, неуверенно улыбается, худющий бледный парнишка пытается приосаниться и встать как военный, по стойке смирно. Лишь несколько подростков с дальнего края шеренги кажутся хмурыми и не слишком впечатленными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The children keep staring at you. A little girl, who's been staying close to Argenta, smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier, and several other kids follow suit. Only a few teenagers from the far end of the column seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

{n}The children keep staring at you. A little girl, who's been staying close to Argenta, smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier, and several other kids follow suit. Only a few teenagers from the far end of the column seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

{n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

{n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

{n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

{n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}孩子们一直盯着你看，一直紧贴着阿洁塔的女孩露出了不确定的笑容。其中一位身体瘦弱、脸色苍白的小伙子努力向后挺着肩膀，像士兵一样立正。只有远处的几名少年看起来闷闷不乐，并没有被你的讲话所感染。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}孩子们一直盯着你看，一直紧贴着阿洁塔的小女孩露出了不确定的笑容。其中一位身体瘦弱、脸色苍白的小伙子努力向后挺着肩膀，像士兵一样立正，其他几个孩子也纷纷效仿。只有远处的几名少年看起来闷闷不乐，并没有被你的讲话所感染。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los adolescentes no paran de mirarte. Una muchacha que no se separa de Argenta sonríe, incierta. Un mozo pálido y escuchimizado intenta enderezarse y ponerse firme como un soldado. Solo unos pocos al fondo de la fila se muestran deprimidos y poco impresionados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los niños no paran de mirarte. Una niña pequeña que no se separa de Argenta sonríe, incierta. Un mozo pálido y escuchimizado intenta enderezarse y ponerse firme como un soldado y varios otros lo imitan. Solo unos pocos adolescentes al fondo de la fila se muestran deprimidos y poco impresionados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}青少年たちはじっとあなたを見つめている。アルジェンタの近くにいた少女が不安そうに微笑んだ。やせ細った青白い若者が背筋を伸ばし、兵士のように立とうとする。列の一番端にいる数人の青少年だけが不機嫌そうで、特に感銘を受けた様子もなさそうにしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}青少年たちはじっとあなたを見つめている。アルジェンタの近くにいた少女が不安そうに微笑んだ。やせ細った青白い若者が背筋を伸ばし、兵士のように立とうとする。列の一番端にいる数人の青少年だけが不機嫌そうで、特に感銘を受けた様子もなさそうにしていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Teenager starren dich weiterhin an. Ein Mädchen, das in Argentas Nähe geblieben ist, lächelt unsicher. Ein dünner, blasser Junge versucht, die Schultern zurückzunehmen und strammzustehen wie ein Soldat. Nur einige Teenager am anderen Ende der Reihe wirken mürrisch und nicht sonderlich beeindruckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kinder starren dich weiterhin an. Ein kleines Mädchen, das in Argentas Nähe geblieben ist, lächelt unsicher. Ein dünner, blasser Junge versucht, die Schultern zurückzunehmen und strammzustehen wie ein Soldat, und einige andere Kinder machen es ihm nach. Nur einige Teenager am anderen Ende der Reihe wirken mürrisch und nicht sonderlich beeindruckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les regards des jeunes restent braqués sur vous. Une fillette à côté d'Argenta arbore un sourire hésitant. Un garçon maigrichon au visage pâle essaie de se tenir le plus droit possible, comme pour se mettre au garde-à-vous. Seuls quelques adolescents au bout de la rangée affichent une mine maussade et ne semblent pas particulièrement impressionnés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les regards des orphelins restent braqués sur vous. Une fillette à côté d'Argenta arbore un sourire hésitant. Un garçon maigrichon au visage pâle essaie de se tenir le plus droit possible, comme pour se mettre au garde-à-vous, et plusieurs autres enfants l'imitent. Seuls quelques adolescents au bout de la rangée affichent une mine maussade et ne semblent pas particulièrement impressionnés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gençler, gözlerini bir an bile olsun üzerinden ayırmıyor. Argenta'ya sokulan bir kız, tereddüt ederek gülümsüyor. Cılız olduğu kadar soluk tenli bir delikanlı da omuzlarını geri atarak asker selamı vermeye çalışıyor. Sıranın en ucundaki birkaç gencin suratı asık, etkilenmedikleri gün gibi ortada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The teenagers keep staring at you. A girl who has remained close to Argenta smiles uncertainly. A skinny pale lad tries to throw his shoulders back and stand at attention like a soldier. Only a few teenagers at the far end of the row seem sullen and not particularly impressed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gençler, gözlerini bir an bile olsun üzerinden ayırmıyor. Argenta'ya sokulan bir kız, tereddüt ederek gülümsüyor. Cılız olduğu kadar soluk tenli bir delikanlı da omuzlarını geri atarak asker selamı vermeye çalışıyor. Sıranın en ucundaki birkaç gencin suratı asık, etkilenmedikleri ise gün gibi ortada.{/n}
